name: Sophia Jacob
bio: Through dramatic chiaroscuro lighting, Jacob captures the raw vulnerability of the human form. Her portraits reveal what words conceal.
artistStatement: The camera is a confessional. I don't take photographs — I receive them. My subjects offer something invisible, and the light catches it for a fraction of a second. That fraction is everything.
exhibitions: Group — 'Light & Shadow', MoMA PS1, New York, 2023

paintings.title: The Witness
paintings.description: A solitary figure emerges from absolute darkness — vulnerability made luminous.
